job description:
Reference: PE006430-Niv-1

Our client based in the Centurion /Pretoria area is looking for a Data Scientist with the following qualifications, skills and experience;
EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS

An honours degree (preferably a masters or PhD) in a quantitative discipline that includes significant exposure to mathematics (linear algebra and calculus), statistics and computer science.

A candidate whose highest qualification is an honours degree should have at least 5 years of relevant work experience (i.e. developing statistical models and/or machine learning algorithms to solve business problems). Candidates with a masters or PhD degree should have at least 2 years of relevant work experience. The candidate should also have the following:
  • Extensive experience with at least one programming language (e.g. Python), statistical package (e.g. R) and database language (e.g. SQL)
  • Deep theoretical understanding of statistical methods and machine learning techniques
  • Demonstrated ability to apply statistical methods and machine learning techniques to solve business problems
  • Demonstrated skills in formulating business problems to enable statistical modelling
  • Demonstrated ability to select the right statistical tools and techniques for the job
  • Experience translating statistical findings into business recommendations
  • Strong data visualisation skills
  • Effective written and verbal communication skills
  • Ability to work independently
  • Willingness to both teach others and learn new techniques
  • Experience with distributed processing, cloud-based computing and big data would be an advantage
